title: Lag ONLY in League Of Legends

embed.description: MacOS: open a Finder window, press âŒ˜-Shift-G, and paste in /Applications/League of Legends.app/Contents/LOL/Logs/Network Logs

body:
I just had a game where I was fine for the start of the game, then the ping goes to 300 and packets loss was past 20. 20 minutes into the game I was fine again... 
This problem only happens with LOL ever since the 6.17 update 
Does anyone have similar problem? If so do you have a fix?
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: if you have nividia experience installed with drivers. remove experience leave the driver. I had same problem.  I tried many things, this fixed it.
It's the 6.17 patch. Can play all my other games with no problems. Used the repair thing ect. ect. ect. Guess ill play something else until its fixed. Cya

A sudden spike in ping does sound like your network could be having issues maintaining a connection or packet loss, which would result in input delays.  I'm not familiar with the site you are using, so I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) instead to get an overview of your network.  Let me know if you have any questions!
